review: Very good doctor very friendly attitude.... She give me proper treatment for my father... And that clinic is also very clean with good atmosphere. She gives us proper suggestions for my father..I am very thankful to her for treating us so well...thank you ma'am
Ma'am is very polite and patience. She explains the issues very well and medicines prescribed by her are very effective. Whenever I visit her she gives a positive vibes. A very big thank you to her .

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I had a paid appointment at 12.20pm through practo, but the dr arrived at 2pm. Info available on practo regarding the consultation timing is completely inaccurate. The clinic is not taking any covid safety measures, patients and their families are practically sitting on top of each other. Receptionists are very rude and supply inaccurate info as well. Not recommended.

I had health issue so went to hospital. I am not still not recovered. I had cough related issue. I am still facing cough related issue again since last 2 months. Later lock down started and was unable to visit. I am 30 percent fine with consultation. I cannot recommend doctor to my family or friends. I am having same issue. I want to do video consultation. Medicine was prescribed by the doctor. There was no waiting time in the hospital. Hospitality was good.

I had Met the doctor for a routine Health checkup, there was 30 min waiting time to consult ,Medicine was not prescribed but test where done , satisfied with the doctor and his treatment, I would like to recommend the doctor, *** ****** ** **** **** *** ******** ** **** *****
